about_the_game:
Click the Chick!

Meet an adorable chick in this wholesome clicker game! Living on your screen, your feathered friend generates eggs for you to click and collect. Enjoy the cheerful company of your chick. Cheep cheep cheep!

Click the Chick is a minimalistic relaxing desktop companion pet clicker idle collectible egg farming game. The revolutionary genre of clicking on a bunch of pixels is among us and we are proud to present you with a ground-breaking game that builds on revolutionary mechanics that are hand-tailored for the player's needs.

Chick the Click?

Are you ready to click the Chick? This game offers unique, never-seen gameplay action that will completely immerse you as the player into chicken clicking! Click the chick while you play, click it when you eat, and click it even with two hands! Have you ever wondered how one can click the chick without hands? Use your feet and click the chick! If you feel like we want you to click the chick, you are on the right track... we always welcome suggestions on how to click it and If you feel brave enough, you might double-click the chick.

Feel like clicking the chick with a gamepad? Well too bad... Our chick can only be clicked with the mouse.

Chirp, Chirp, Chirp!

Click it or it will eat your soul. Wait, what?!

Click the Chick is a minimalistic relaxing desktop companion pet clicker idle collectible egg farming game. Are you ready to click the Chick? This game offers unique, never-seen gameplay action that will completely immerse you as the player into chicken clicking! Click the chick while you play, click it when you eat, and click it even with two hands! Have you ever wondered how one can click the chick without hands? Use your feet and click the chick! If you feel like we want you to click the chick, you are on the right track... we always welcome suggestions on how to click it and If you feel brave enough, you might double-click the chick.

Feel like clicking the chick with a gamepad? Well too bad... Our chick can only be clicked with the mouse.

name: Click the Chick

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: The chick hungers for the click! Are you ready to click it and be the clicker of the chick?! Chirp, Chirp, Chirp!
